precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
action: Click the 'Start' button on the left side of the taskbar.
expected_results: The 'Start' menu will open, displaying options like 'Control Panel'.

precondition: The Windows XP 'Start' menu is open and the 'Control Panel' option is visible.
action: Click the 'Control Panel' option in the Start menu.
expected_results: The Control Panel window will open.

precondition: The Control Panel is open and the 'Appearance and Themes' category is visible.
action: Move the mouse cursor to the 'Choose a screen saver' task icon.
expected_results: The 'Choose a screen saver' task will become highlighted.

precondition: The "Appearance and Themes" category is open in the Windows XP Control Panel.
The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Themes" tab is selected.
expected_results: The "Display Properties" window will display the options for the "Screen Saver" tab.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected.
action: Click on the dropdown arrow of the 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu will expand, revealing a list of available screen saver options.

precondition: The "Screen Saver" tab of the "Display Properties" window is open.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will open in front of the "Display Properties" window.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is active. The "Power" button is visible in the "Monitor power" section.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will open, displaying the "Power Schemes" tab. The "Home/Office Desk" power scheme will be selected by default.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open and the 'Power Schemes' tab is selected. The 'Home/Office Desk' power scheme is currently active.
action: Click the dropdown menu to the right of the 'Turn off monitor' option.
expected_results: A dropdown menu with a list of time options will appear.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open and the 'Home/Office Desk' power scheme is selected. The 'System hibernates' dropdown menu is expanded.
action: Click the 'After 5 hours' item in the 'System hibernates' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The 'System hibernates' dropdown menu will show 'After 5 hours' as the selected option.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active. The "Power schemes" listbox currently displays "Home/Office Desk".
action: Click the dropdown arrow of the "Power schemes" listbox.
expected_results: A dropdown menu will appear, displaying a list of available power schemes. The "Always On" power scheme will be visible in the list.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active.
action: Click the "Always On" item in the "Power schemes" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will remain open. The power management settings displayed below will correspond to the "Always On" power scheme.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active. The "Always On" power scheme is selected.
action: Click the dropdown button for the "Turn off hard disks" setting.
expected_results: A dropdown menu with a list of time intervals will appear, allowing you to select when to turn off the hard disks.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Always On" power scheme is selected.
action: Click the dropdown button next to "Turn off monitor".
expected_results: A dropdown menu will appear with a list of time interval options, ranging from "After 1 min" to "Never".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active. The "System hibernates" dropdown menu is expanded.
action: Click the "Never" item in the "System hibernates" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "System hibernates" setting will change to "Never".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open with the "Always On" power scheme selected.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close. The "Display Properties" window will remain open.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open, showing the "Screen Saver" tab.
action: Click the "OK" button at the bottom of the "Display Properties" window.
expected_results: The "Display Properties" window will close, and the "Appearance and Themes" window will become visible.

precondition: The "Appearance and Themes" window is open in the Windows XP Control Panel.
action: Click on the 'Close' button in the top right corner of the "Appearance and Themes" window.
expected_results: The "Appearance and Themes" window will close.
